critique: The document is a delegation of authority. The primary emotion the President wants to elicit is probably a sense of confidence and efficiency in the government. There isn't much emotional content here, so most scores will be low. Initial scores: Joy: 2, Sadness: 1, Anger: 1, Fear: 1, Disgust: 1, Surprise: 1. Revised scores: Joy: 3, Sadness: 1, Anger: 1, Fear: 1, Disgust: 1, Surprise: 1.
